thread.title: Int'l amber, jewelry fair showcases Baltic amber | The Star
thread.title_full: Int'l amber, jewelry fair showcases Baltic amber | The Star

author: Cui Li,Zhang Zhang
title: Int'l amber, jewelry fair showcases Baltic amber | The Star
text:
WARSAW, March 12 (Xinhua) -- The AMBERIF Spring 2025 trade fair, a leading European event for jewelry and amber, opened Wednesday in Gdansk, Poland, attracting global exhibitors and designers.
Running through March 14, the event highlights Baltic amber craftsmanship, with a fashion and jewelry showcase on opening day and a public open day for art students on Friday.
AMBERIF strengthens Gdansk's legacy as a global amber hub, blending commerce with centuries-old tradition.
